category.item: Two-factor Authentication helps protecting your account, as you will be asked a one time code after each login. You need Google Authenticator to use Two-factor Authentication.
The given code was already used. For security reasons a single code may not be used more than once. Please wait until a new code was generated.
Enter the code that is displayed on your phone to change Two-factor Authentication settings.
The emergency code was successfully used and Two-factor Authentication was disabled.
Your account is protected with Two-factor authentication. You need the current code to proceed.
Enter the code that is displayed on your phone to proceed.
Scan the QR code or enter the displayed Secret into your Google Authenticator. To active Two-factor Authentication you need to enter the code that displayed on your phone into the input below.

Two-factor Authentication successfully was enabled. Your emergency code is: {$twofaEmergency}. Keep your emergency code in a safe place, you will need it to disable Two-factor Authentication in case your Phone stops working or gets lost.
